boru sakashi dunnoda boruwata diwuruwoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- naya gena naya nudunnoda gini polikaruwoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- an hata lakhena deya walakwuwoda anun nomaga yawuwoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- nisi lesa mahanadami nopuramiin dusil chiwiitha gatha kaloda pawiidiwa pawiidikamihi noyedunoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- allas gaththoda ee papayata anubala dunnoda ge dora gini thabuwoda ee maithri badun nodakinnahuya- gaha kola bhoga wagawan wiinasha kaloda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- washa wiisha kawiwoda hadi huniyami kaloda eki papayanta anubala dunnoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- hora jawarami karuwoda adhiika milata welaheladami kaloda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya- boruwen wanchawen chatuwen mathi amathi warun naradetuwan nomaga yawwoda napuru awi aayudha thanuwoda eki papayanta anubala dunnoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya anekakara krama upakrama walin rata wasiyata hinsa pida pamiina wu raja mathi amathi palakayoda wawi pokunu gannga aadi jalashayan apirisindu kaloda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya daruwan nomaga yawiwoda yuthukam pahara hariyoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya sarwagnya dharmaya pahath kota salaku=woda manna adhiikawa anun pahath kota thaman usas lesa salaku=woda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya ambaudaruwan atharaman kaloda anun baya gannuwoda ee maithri budun nodakinnahuya ihatha ki paridi aku=sal kalo ee maithri budun nodakinne kawara heyinda yath mei papakarmayan kirima nisa maranin mathu sanjiwaya sanghathaya kalasuthraya raurawaya maha raurawaya thapaya prathapaya awiichiya yana atamaha narakayanta watii owuhu anantha apramana kalayak apramana duk wiidinnahuya ee maithri sarwagnyayan wahanse ge kalaya wana wiitada meki noki pawukam kalo ee apayanhima wesena bawiin aho ewunta ee maithri budu rajanan wahanse nodakiya haki wannemaya maithira buduun dakinno: thawada ee maithri sarwagnyayan wahanse dakinno kawarahuda yath?
